data.name: FSX Steam Edition: Farm Strips Vol 3: South West England & Wales Add-On
data.detailed_description:
Return to grassroots flying in the UK with Farm Strips Volume 3: South West England & Wales. This scenery pack is a collection of 18 airstrips recreating the small airfields often used by microlights and ultralights across South West England and Wales.

Located in rural locations and often in or surrounded by farm fields, the airstrips in Farm Strips Volume 3 include ground textures and scenic models galore! The facilities available at each of the strips vary; some offer refuelling, custom object detail, or simply a view over crops or cattle.

Farm Strips Volume 3: South West England & Wales includes airstrips in Hereford, Devon, Brecon Beacons, Shrewsbury, Clwyd, Somerset, Radnorshire, Carmarthenshire, Cornwall, Pembrokeshire, Shropshire and North Wales – this is the perfect introduction to small time flying in the UK!

As an added bonus, also included is the CFM Streak Shadow along with 7 liveries, ideal for exploring the countryside from above!

Features:

  • 18 farm strips located in the South West regions of England and Wales.
  • CFM Streak Shadow included with 7 liveries
  • Includes 8 flight plans for flights between the farm strips
  • Unique models
  • Sounds effects around the farm strips
  • Custom effects to bring life into the airstrips
  • Ideal for use with Just Flight’s VFR Real Scenery Vol. 3 (Wales & SW England), available on Steam

data.short_description: Return to grassroots flying in the UK with Farm Strips Volume 3: South West England & Wales. This scenery pack is a collection of 18 airstrips recreating the small airfields often used by microlights and ultralights across South West England and Wales.

fullgame.name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
